snippet.title: Idle Tower Defense | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Idle Tower Defense is a game where you control a single tower to fight off hordes of enemies. No randomization. Choose from a variety of modules to create unique builds and upgrade modules and survive endless waves.

Wishlist on Steam if you like it.

Thanks for watching.
